tab.createtreadmill.title: Create: Treadmill
task.createtreadmill.use_treadmill.desc: Â§cDeprecated. Please directly leash the maid to the treadmill.
createtreadmill.ponder.treadmill_run.tex: Mobs can run on it to generate power.
Players can leash mobs onto it.
Though they might... resist a bit.
createtreadmill.ponder.treadmill_fly.tex: The stress on this treadmill is reversed...
So creatures standing on it will be thrown off.
I won't actually move the entity... Let's pretend a villager got launched.
createtreadmill.ponder.treadmill_speedup: When an entity on the treadmill is attacked, the treadmill speeds up for one minute (double speed, non-stackable).
Though the mob might prioritize escaping over running...
createtreadmill.ponder.treadmill_maid.te: If you have Touhou Maid Mod installed, you can assign the 'Treadmill' task to maids, allowing them to operate the treadmill.
Moreover, as her Affection Level increases, the maid generates even more stress.
Of course, the previous mechanics still apply normally...
And the maids won't escape so easily...
advancement.createtreadmill.run_to_die.d:
Kill a mob by exhaustion on a treadmill. (How cruel...)
Â§7(Hidden Advancement)
config.createtreadmill.title: Create: Treadmill Settings
config.createtreadmill.stress.tip: Set the stress generated by the treadmill
config.createtreadmill.base_speed.tip: Set the base speed of the treadmill
config.createtreadmill.drop_it.tip: Whether the treadmill can throw off entities (when powered in reverse)
config.createtreadmill.break.tip: Whether entities on the treadmill can break free
config.createtreadmill.speed_up.tip: Whether attacking entities on the treadmill speeds it up
config.createtreadmill.maid_magnificatio: The stress produced by the treadmill will be multiplied by this value and the Maid Affection Level.
